traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: Warduke wears a dread helm (see appendix A) and wields a flame tongue longsword.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Warduke makes three Flame Tongue or Dagger attacks.

actions.name: Flame Tongue
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 7 (2d6 damage) fire damage if the weapon is aflame.

actions.name: Dagger
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
